snippet.title: Super Jagger Bomb - PC Gameplay (Steam)
snippet.description:
Take the role of a familiar-looking little caped hero whose duty it is to collect bombs and keep stuff from getting blown up! In this retro ‘80s style arcade game, you’ll help the fearless hero Jagger fend of enemy robots and UFOs as he leaps across platforms, air jumps and uses downward dashes to retrieve the firebombs before it’s too late!

With retro-styled 3D graphics and mechanics that are easy to pick up and play but tough to master, Super Jagger Bomb offers a straightforward and rewarding gameplay experience.

Super Jagger Bomb (C) Eastasiasoft Limited / CheapeeSoft Games
Also released on PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5 and Nintendo Switch

#steam #steamgame #steamgames #eastasiasoft #superjaggerbomb
